snippet.title: Tales Of Monkey Island Trailer
snippet.description:
The full season is available now on PSN, PC/Mac, and iOS!

PSN: http://bit.ly/YpbXh6
PC/Mac: http://bit.ly/11Arni7
iOS: http://bit.ly/YQCAuH

While explosively stripping the evil pirate LeChuck of his demonic mojo, Guybrush Threepwood inadvertently infects the entire Caribbean with the arch-fiend's expelled voodoo, which threatens to transform buccaneers into unruly pirate monsters.


Website:http://www.telltalegames.com/monkeyisland
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/telltalegames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/telltalegames
